title: Demon Sejuani
body:
I was looking to draw a concept for Sej and thought god I would be great if Sejuani is a demon, her particles is this blue fire and she's freacking riding Cerberus....also a background story I created for her was that Devil Teemo cut one of her horns so he wouldn't be dethroned by her...hope u guys dig her

https://imgur.com/kuw0fZp

https://imgur.com/34F6Q1y

replies.body:
Did you post this in the Sejuani Mains reddit?
They will love you
if sej would have more infernal armor then I would buy the skin
I like this! I don't play Sej, but this is a nice concept! +1
This is absolutely amazing! Sad though because Riot probably won't give Sejuani a skin for a few years, they only make skins for popular champions...
great skin nice work I'll buy it <3
how do i make my own consepts?

honestly? really really great idea (even her boobs should be bigger imo), great art, and cerberus is one of my most fav myth. creatures. 

but there were so many great skin concepts for seju over the years and what did Riot?

Seju riding a wolf -> Riot implements Seju riding a (cute!!!) pig

Seju riding a drake -> Riot implements Seju riding an ugly lion

and so on-..
I've never been a huge fan of Sejuani but damn, this is pretty sick, and the reason as to why she's missing a horn is great as well.

That's, like, really hot.

Awesome work.
I love how badass this looks! Good job.

My personal absolute wish skin for Sejuani is Chemtech, but I gotta admit, this concept looks pretty cool, too.
Upvoted.
This looks amazing, I would instabuy this skin! {{sticker:sg-lux}}
